spells.description:
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to place a Spelunker's Candle on your head, granting 3,059 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

Moving within 3 yards of an ally places the Spelunker's Candle on both heads, sharing the effect for the remaining duration.
Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,939 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
